pages.text: The Dirtshield Crystal is an elemental type crystal, representing earth. They can be used to get the Dirtshield effect for 5 seconds at the cost of 10% potential, 25% insanity, and 1 $(l:reagents/advanced_reagent)Advanced Reagent$(/l). The Dirtshield effect blocks 75% of all damage to a player for its duration, which naturally can only be 5 seconds.
